forum.name: T1 Optional Discussion: Your LINCS Learning Portal Explorations
forum.intro:
Optional Discussion:
Share Your Thoughts on the LINCS Learning Portal

Based on your explorations of the offerings in the Learning Portal, please post your responses to the following discussion prompts:

  • What courses look interesting to you? Why?
  • What courses might assist you in developing your understanding and use of effective assessment practices?
  • If you’ve taken a LINCS self-paced online course before, please share your experience(s) with your peers.  What did you like? What advice would you give them?

After you post, please take time to review others' introductions in the discussion, and post at least one reply in response.

Note: This item will automatically mark itself complete on the main course outline once you have submitted a post.

Once You Have Completed Your Post:

Click on the Intro-Assessment-ABE link at the top (or at left under "my Courses") to return to the Course Outline and access the next course activity.
